snippet.title: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4  DLC : Airport NEW CHITOSE [RJCC] on STEAM - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.technobrain.com/atc4_g/newchitose/

STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839300/ATC4_Airport_NEW_CHITOSE_RJCC/
*A new airport has been added to "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4"

ATC4 Original Sound Track (streaming)
https://linkco.re/uz193R8p?lang=en

[Airport Covered]
As Hokkaido's largest international airport, New Chitose Airport (CTS/RJCC) handles many international and domestic flights.
At the adjacent Chitose Air Base are engaged in activities to keep Japan safe.

[Control two different types of airfields at the same time!]
Many types of airplanes fly into New Chitose Airport, which is used by various domestic and international airlines.
In addition, training for fighter planes and the Techno Coast Guard frequently takes place at Chitose Air Base.
This game lets you experience the different characteristics of both airfields simultaneously.

[Enjoy two seasons!]
For the first time, I am an Air Traffic Controller 4 covers both the summer and winter seasons!
In the winter stage, runways also close due to snow…
Find precious time between crisscrossing flights to issue orders for snow removal on four runways without disrupting operations!

#ATC #aviation #game #IamanAirTrafficController4 #IamanAirTrafficController #ATC4
